title: nf-core/eager pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

reference_name.errorMessage: Reference name must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta files for the mapping reference must be provided with file extensions '.fasta', '.fa', '.fas', '.fna', '.fasta.gz','.fa.gz','.fas.gz', '.fna.gz' and cannot contain any spaces.

fai.errorMessage: Fasta index files for the mapping reference cannot have any spaces and must have file extension '.fai'.

dict.errorMessage: Picard sequence dictionary files for the mapping reference cannot have any spaces and must have file extensions '.dict'.

mapper_index.errorMessage: The directories of the index files for the mapping reference for a given mapper must not contain any spaces and have file extensions ''.

circular_target.errorMessage: The headers of the chromosome extended by circulargenerator must not contain any spaces and no leading '>'.

circularmapper_elongatedfasta.errorMessage: The elongated Fasta files for the mapping reference must be provided with file extensions '.fasta', '.fa', '.fas', '.fna', '.fasta.gz','.fa.gz','.fas.gz', '.fna.gz' and cannot contain any spaces.

circularmapper_elongatedindex.errorMessage: The directories of the index files for the elongated mapping reference for circularmapper must not contain any spaces and have file extensions ''.

mitochondrion_header.errorMessage: The names of the fasta entry of the mapping reference corresponding to the mitochondrial genome must not contain any spaces and no leading '>'.

snpcapture_bed.errorMessage: SNP capture bed files must not contain any spaces and have file extensions '.bed' or '.bed.gz'.

pileupcaller_bedfile.errorMessage: SNP capture bed files for pileupcaller must not contain any spaces, have file extensions '.bed' or '.bed.gz' and be provided alongside a pileupcall_bedfile.

pileupcaller_snpfile.errorMessage: SNP panel files for pileupcaller must not contain any spaces, have file extension '.snp' and be provided alongside a pileupcaller_snpfile.

hapmap_file.errorMessage: HapMap files for contamination estimation with ANGSD must not contain any spaces.

pmdtools_masked_fasta.errorMessage: Masked fasta files for PMDtools must not contain any spaces and have file extensions '.fasta', '.fa', '.fas', '.fna', '.fasta.gz','.fa.gz','.fas.gz' or '.fna.gz'.

pmdtools_bed_for_masking.errorMessage: SNP capture bed files to mask the reference for PMDtools must not contain any spaces and have file extensions '.bed' or '.bed.gz'.

sexdeterrmine_snp_bed.errorMessage: SNP capture bed files for SexDetERRmine must not contain any spaces and have file extensions '.bed' or '.bed.gz'.

bedtools_feature_file.errorMessage: Feature files must not contain any spaces and have file extensions '.bed', '.bed.gz', '.gff', '.gff.gz', '.gff3' or '.gff3.gz'.

genotyping_reference_ploidy.errorMessage: Organism ploidy for GATK or FreeBayes must be provided as integers.

genotyping_gatk_dbsnp.errorMessage: SNP annotation files for GATK must not contain any spaces and have file extension '.vcf'.
